results.name: Pixel Art - Four color Portraits (4 colors like in game boy)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux (64-bit x86)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or higher
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
